title: Outsiders
description: Kharl just wants his freedom again, chased by a faceless government. Lilith needs answers about a past she can't remember. Markin is the rebel leader, distrusting of the alien benefactors that saved us from world destruction. The Outsiders will find what they seek, but it won't be an easy task. The utopian facade will fall down, brick by brick.NOTE: This edition shows the previous cover image.
author: Dannielle Levan
